tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_revised_project_cost AS SELECT aa.amp_activity_id, aa.amp_activity_id AS object_id, aa.amp_activity_id AS object_id2, afa.amount AS transaction_amount, afa.amp_currency_id AS currency_id, afa.date AS transaction_date FROM amp_activity_version aa JOIN amp_funding_amount afa ON (aa.amp_activity_id = afa.amp_activity_id) AND (afa.type = 1) AND (afa.amount IS NOT NULL) AND (afa.date IS NOT NULL);
